Looking forward to trying more from their menu soon. Highly recommend supporting this cozy home-based gem!

Chanced upon this on Google Map and decided to give it a try! It‚Äôs available on Sat and Sun. Ordered their signature - Lazy Cup. Fantastic drink, with a great balance of sweetness and coffee. Keep it going!
Very good cup of coffee with an addictive sweetened cream topper, great on a hot afternoon! A neighbourhood spot that I‚Äôll be returning to try their other drinks.
Ordered the lazycup. The coffee really perked me up and the cream was good too! Maybe can add a bit of Seasalt for a twist? Haha. Something to look forward to on a weekend!
